description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Greek Lamb Skewers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Marinated Greek Lamb Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Zest 2 lemons and combine with 2 tbs oil, oregano, garlic and 1 tsp ground pepper. Cut lamb into 2-3cm pieces and thread onto 8 skewers. Place in an ovenproof dish and spread over marinade, turning to coat. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
Remove from fridge 1 hour prior to cooking. Remove plastic wrap.

Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook lamb for 6-8 minutes, turning and brushing with marinade, or until slightly charred and cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate and set aside to rest, lightly covered with foil, for 5 minutes.
Slice remaining lemon and chargrill slices for 1-2 minutes on each side or until scorched.
Juice 1 lemon and combine with remaining oil and olives. Drizzle over lamb and serve scattered with extra oregano.
